content: just landed in NYC, and the skyline always gets me. feels like the city's pulse is beating through me. time to get back into quant trading. new start, here we go.
raw_content: The skyline of NYC never fails to stir something in me. Just touched down and already feeling the city's pulse. Time to restart, rebuild, and dive back into the world of quant trading.

content: Just hit 22 and back to the grind  Had a chill coffee sesh with my mentor, diving deep into market vibes and AI trading. Feeling pretty hyped to tweak my strategies now.
raw_content: Just turned 22 and already back in the grind. Had a deep chat with a mentor over coffee, discussing market dynamics and the potential of AI in trading. Feeling inspired to refine my strategies.

content: So, I hit up this local blockchain meetup last night. The conversations were on point - DeFi, smart contracts, you name it. Even scored an invite to a startup's open day. Networking vibes, am I right?
raw_content: Joined a local meetup for blockchain enthusiasts. Met some sharp minds, exchanged ideas about DeFi and smart contracts. Got an invite to a startup's open day. Networking, here I come.

content: Just spent 12 days wrestling with Python to build a basic algo trading bot. It’s janky but it’s mine. Next up, AI to predict market moves. We're getting somewhere!
raw_content: Spent the last 12 days diving into Python for algorithmic trading. Got my hands dirty with a basic trading bot. It's clunky, but it's a start. Now to integrate some AI to predict market trends.

content: Swung by a friend's trading firm. Their setup is intense and they dropped some knowledge on risk management. Ngl, it's a bit overwhelming how much i've got left to learn, but also super stoked!
raw_content: Visited a family friend's trading firm. Saw their setup, got some advice on risk management. It's humbling to realize how much there is to learn, but also exciting.

content: took some time to think about my past losses and worked out a new strategy with my mentor. We're all about backtesting and making sure the risk is worth the reward. It's not just about the cash, but learning from where I went wrong too.
raw_content: Been reflecting on past losses. Developed a new strategy with a mentor, focusing on backtesting and risk-adjusted returns. It's not just about making profits, but also about learning from mistakes.

content: Just got out of a coding session with some DeFi devs. Helped audit a smart contract and tbh, it's crazy how much you pick up just by hanging with smart folks.
raw_content: Joined a coding session with a group of developers working on a DeFi project. Contributed to a smart contract audit. It's incredible how much I've learned just by being around like-minded people.
